headline: 3 Reasons PEP is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, PepsiCo’s stock price fell to $130.15. Shareholders have lost 18.6% of their capital, disappointing when considering the S&P 500 was flat. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
